input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2

Product specifications:
Sizzix original die
2.75H x 4.75W - Small Dies
Medium Dies- 4.75 x 2.75
Steel-rule construction
Can cut up to 3 sheets of cardstock; fabric foam; magnet; metallic foil; photos; vellum; and sandpaper
Compatible with the original sizzix machine and the bigkick and big shot machines
input_text.Response A: Get your sizzix on with the Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2! This steel-rule construction die can cut through 3 sheets of cardstock, fabric foam, magnet, metallic foil, photos, vellum, and sandpaper. It's compatible with the original Sizzix machine, as well as the bigkick and big shot machines. Go ahead and sizz it up!
input_text.Response B: Ellison SIZZIX- Orignal dies feature a steel-rule construction to make amazing shapes. These dies can cut up to 3 sheets of cardstock as well as fabric foam vellum and other materials. They are compatible with the Original Sizzie machine as well as the BIGkick and Bigshot machines. Small Dies- 2.375 x 2.75 Medium Dies- 4.75 x 2.75

label_annotations.feedback: I find response A more simplier to understand why getting the info across. Response B is still good bit more professional
